cities: Map showing city locations across the United States
cities_lambert: Map showing city locations in Lambert conformal conic projection
coasts: Coastline boundaries of the United States
counties: County boundaries across the United States
cwa: County Warning Areas - regions served by National Weather Service forecast offices
firs: Flight Information Regions for aviation weather monitoring
highways: Major highway systems across the United States
ndfd.conus.apparentt: Apparent temperature - how hot it feels to the human body when relative humidity is combined with air temperature
ndfd.conus.apparentt.points: Apparent temperature values at specific forecast points
ndfd.conus.apparentt.points.metric: Apparent temperature values at specific forecast points in Celsius
ndfd.conus.canl: Critical atmospheric conditions that support fire behavior
ndfd.conus.canl.points: Critical atmospheric conditions that support fire behavior at specific points
ndfd.conus.cdcb: Combined drought conditions and burning index
ndfd.conus.cdcb.points: Combined drought conditions and burning index at specific points
ndfd.conus.ceil: Cloud ceiling height - the lowest altitude where clouds cover more than half the sky
ndfd.conus.ceil.points: Cloud ceiling height at specific forecast points
ndfd.conus.ceil.points.metric: Cloud ceiling height at specific forecast points in meters
ndfd.conus.convoutlook: Convective outlook - risk of thunderstorms and severe weather
ndfd.conus.convoutlook.points: Convective outlook risk at specific points
ndfd.conus.evp168: Total evaporation expected over 168 hours (7 days)
ndfd.conus.evp168.points: Total evaporation expected over 168 hours at specific points
ndfd.conus.evp168.points.metric: Total evaporation expected over 168 hours at specific points in millimeters
ndfd.conus.evp24.points: Total evaporation expected over 24 hours at specific points
ndfd.conus.evp24.points.metric: Total evaporation expected over 24 hours at specific points in millimeters
ndfd.conus.evpdep24: Evaporation depletion over 24 hours - difference between potential and actual evaporation
ndfd.conus.evpdep24.points: Evaporation depletion over 24 hours at specific points
ndfd.conus.evpdep24.points.metric: Evaporation depletion over 24 hours at specific points in millimeters
ndfd.conus.freewindspd: Wind speed at the free atmosphere (above surface friction)
ndfd.conus.freewindspd.points: Wind speed at the free atmosphere at specific points
ndfd.conus.freewindspd.points.english: Wind speed at the free atmosphere at specific points in miles per hour
ndfd.conus.freewindspd.points.metric: Wind speed at the free atmosphere at specific points in meters per second
ndfd.conus.freewindspd.points.nautical: Wind speed at the free atmosphere at specific points in knots
ndfd.conus.hailprob.points: Probability of hail occurrence at specific points
ndfd.conus.haines: Haines Index - measure of atmospheric stability and moisture content related to fire growth potential
ndfd.conus.haines.points: Haines Index values at specific points
ndfd.conus.heatrisk: Heat risk assessment for human health
ndfd.conus.heatrisk.points: Heat risk assessment for human health at specific points
ndfd.conus.iceaccum: Ice accumulation - freezing rain and sleet buildup
ndfd.conus.iceaccum.points.metric: Ice accumulation at specific points in millimeters
ndfd.conus.lal: Lightning Activity Level - risk of lightning-caused fires
ndfd.conus.lal.points: Lightning Activity Level at specific points
ndfd.conus.llwsdist: Low-level wind shear distance - measure of hazardous wind changes near the surface
ndfd.conus.llwsdist.points: Low-level wind shear distance at specific points
ndfd.conus.llwsdist.points.english: Low-level wind shear distance at specific points in feet
ndfd.conus.llwsdist.points.metric: Low-level wind shear distance at specific points in meters
ndfd.conus.llwswinddir.points: Low-level wind shear wind direction at specific points
ndfd.conus.llwswindspd.points: Low-level wind shear wind speed at specific points

ndfd.conus.llwswindspd.windbarbs.metric: Low-level wind shear wind speed displayed as wind barbs in meters per second
ndfd.conus.maxrh.points: Maximum relative humidity expected at specific points

ndfd.conus.maxt.points.metric: Maximum temperature expected at specific points in Celsius

ndfd.conus.mixht: Mixing height - altitude to which pollutants can disperse in the atmosphere

ndfd.conus.mixht.points.metric: Mixing height at specific points in meters

ndfd.conus.ppi: Precipitation Potential Index - likelihood and intensity of precipitation

ndfd.conus.probdrylightning24: Probability of dry lightning over 24 hours (lightning without rain)

ndfd.conus.probtsrwe24: Probability of thunderstorm-related severe weather events over 24 hours

ndfd.conus.probwindspd34c: Probability of sustained wind speeds reaching 34 knots (39 mph) from convection

ndfd.conus.probwindspd34i: Probability of sustained wind speeds reaching 34 knots (39 mph) independent of convection

ndfd.conus.probwindspd50i: Probability of sustained wind speeds reaching 50 knots (58 mph) independent of convection

ndfd.conus.probwindspd64i: Probability of sustained wind speeds reaching 64 knots (74 mph) independent of convection

ndfd.conus.qpf: Quantitative Precipitation Forecast - amount of rain/snow expected

ndfd.conus.qpf.points.metric: Quantitative Precipitation Forecast at specific points in millimeters
ndfd.conus.rh: Relative humidity - amount of water vapor in the air compared to the maximum possible

ndfd.conus.totalsnowamt.points.metric: Total snowfall amount expected at specific points in centimeters

ndfd.conus.totalxtrmprob: Total extreme weather probability - combined risk of all extreme weather events

ndfd.conus.windspd.windbarbs.metric: Wind speed displayed as wind barbs in meters per second

ndfd.conus.wx: Weather - general weather conditions and precipitation types
